name: Vacation Simulator
description: Welcome to the Vacation Simulator: a rough approximation of VACATION inspired by real human NOT JOBBING, brought to you by the same robots behind the Job Simulator. Reallocate your bandwidth and get ready to splash, sâ€™more, snowball, and selfie your way to optimal relaxation!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better Storage: 4 GB available space
